title: Like Gotham black but a bit warmer?
content:
I'm looking for a typeface that comes in heavy weights, and has echoes of Gotham black (strong, authoritative but unpretentious), but isn't Gotham. A bit warmer, perhaps with subtly rounded corners, or perhaps a bit more condensed. Still basically geometrical though.

This is mainly for a logo, probably all-caps.

Neutra would be a possibility, except there are two Ns in the logo and the sharp-angled Neutra N isn't the feel I'm going for here.

Any ideas?
author: Zach

comments.content:
Brandon Grotesque  
Proxima Nova  
Avenir/Avenir Next  
Neuzeit Grotesk
Nick Cooke, that's it – thanks so much.
Thanks Zach, I'll look forward to your order!
